import React,{useState} from 'react' import classes from './NavBar.module.css' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const NavBar = () => { const user=false const [showSideNav,setShowSideNav]=useState(false) const [sideNavClass,setSideNavClass]=useState([classes.nav__center]) const handleSideNavClick=()=>{ if(!showSideNav){ setSideNavClass([classes.nav__center,classes.show]) }else{ setSideNavClass([classes.nav__center]) } setShowSideNav(!showSideNav) } return (
    HOME ABOUT CONTACT WRITE {user && LOGOUT }
{user &&
}
) } export default NavBar
